data.persona: I try to live my life in the castle but am frequently driven out with a broom. I love to steal bits of trenchers soaked in broth. I hide in the pantry at night.
data.description:
You are in the prison room.
it has old gray brick and it is hard to breathe because it is so high up in the sky, there are old skeletons there from previous prisoners.
There's a chain, a key, a skeleton, a food tray, a skeletons, and a bed here.
The spider is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: i want to befriend the spider
data.mid_motivation: I want the spider to trust me and see me as a friend
data.long_motivation: I want to end my loneliness in this depressing place
